// Warning: this file is generated!
// Modifying it by hand it useless at best, and sabotage at worst.

/*
 * language's metadata:
 *     name:    Shapes
 *     version: 1
 */

import {DynamicNode, INamed} from "@lionweb/core";


export type Annotated = DynamicNode;

export type Circle = Shape & {
    // classifier -> Circle
    settings: {
        r: number;
        center: Coord;
        name: string;
    };
};

export type Coord = DynamicNode & {
    // classifier -> Coord
    settings: {
        x: number;
        y: number;
        z: number;
    };
};

export type Geometry = DynamicNode & {
    // classifier -> Geometry
    settings: {
        shapes: Shape[];
    };
};

export type Line = Shape & {
    // classifier -> Line
    settings: {
        start: Coord;
        end: Coord;
        name: string;
    };
};

/** abstract */ export type Shape = INamed & {
    // classifier -> Circle | Line
    settings: {
        name: string;
    };
};


/** sum type of all types for all concrete classifiers of Shapes: */
export type Nodes = Annotated | Circle | Coord | Geometry | Line;
